title: How to Motor in PLCs
description: Learn motor for PLC programming. Perfect for beginners and intermediate programmers.
hook: Want to master motor? In the next 3 minutes, you'll learn exactly how.
intro: Today we're covering motor - a fundamental concept every PLC programmer needs to know.

sections.title: What is it?
sections.script: First, let's understand what motor actually means. Step 1: Open Studio 5000 software and create a new project

sections.title: How it works
sections.script:
Here's the step-by-step process. Step 1: Open Studio 5000 software and create a new project.
Step 2: Add a new ladder logic routine to the MainProgram.
Step 3: Drag an XIC (Examine If Closed) instruction onto Rung 0.
Step 4: Drag an OTE (Output Energize) instruction next to the XIC.
Step 5: Assign tags to the instructions (e.g., St
